means: （使）（考试、某学科的成绩等）不及格

sentence.Network_en: He didn't flunk out, but his record isn't so hot.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有不及格, 但成绩很一般.

sentence.Network_en: Of course there are some who flunk this life too commonplace to be worthwhile.
sentence.Network_cn: 自然,也有人将不屑于这平庸.

sentence.Network_en: Because of the laziness, the boy was flunk in the exam.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于懒惰, 这男孩考试不及格.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 求英语课堂用语！要详细的！_百度知道 ... Faculty： 全体教授。 Flunk： 不及格。 Graduate program： 研究所课程。.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... fluke mind 侥幸心理 flunk 失败 flunk out 退学.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... skunk 臭鼬，黄鼠狼 flunk 考试不及格 spunk 勇气，胆量.
英语巴士论坛 ... flower v. 开花 flunk v. （美口语）通不过（考试等） flutter v. 盘旋.

list.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... flunk 失败 flunk out 退学 fluorescent antibody technique 荧光抗体法.

jx.jx_en_mean: To expel or be expelled from a school or course because of work that does not meet required standards.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 除名，退学：因考试成绩不合格而从学校或该门课程中除掉或被除掉学习资格

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (in the general sense 'back down, fail utterly'; originally US): perhaps related to funk or to US flink 'be a coward', perhaps a variant of flinch

entry.tran: 在(考试)中不及格;未通过(某一课程)
entry.def: If you flunk an exam or a course, you fail to reach the required standard.

example.ex: Your son is upset because he flunked a history exam.
example.tran: 你儿子心烦意乱是因为没有通过历史考试。

means.word_mean: 1. fail to get a passing grade;

auth_sentence.content: It would certainly flunk risk management.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would certainly flunk risk management.

auth_sentence.content: You know, John Briggs, I'm going to flunk that test.
auth_sentence.res_content: You know, John Briggs, I'm going to flunk that test.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You know, John Briggs, I'm going to flunk that test.

auth_sentence.content: If they can't, they flunk out. I invite you to come to the prison where I have worked.
